channel.title: New RSPS coder. Many questions. Probably obvious answers
channel.description:
Hello!
I'm just starting to do coding for java and RSPSs, i know next to nil. But am expiramenting. I'm using Project Insanity to base my server off, and i forget the client name, but it went with it. I got my game up and working, but there are a few things i want to start with.
1. What are some easy things i should look into to start off, i still need to make sure my server runes on my no-ip and need help setting up that. But after that where should i start? What are basic things i should know/learn and go over first? 2. I am aiming/wanting to add Dclaws with a fully functional 4x spec attack with animations. Is this hard or easy, and how would i go about doing that. 3. I edited my character file to be 99 in every skill. When i talk to the wise old man (skillcape store) i can see all of them and value and attempt to buy them. as long as i have no cash in my inventory. now when i talk to him with cash in my inventory. My client freezes. How do I fix this?
if anyone can tell me how, or point me to tutorials on how that would be great thanks :D

item.title: New RSPS coder. Many questions. Probably obvious answers
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

[quote=“grayzai11, post:1, topic:450203”]Hello!

I’m just starting to do coding for java and RSPSs, i know next to nil. But am expiramenting. I’m using Project Insanity to base my server off, and i forget the client name, but it went with it. I got my game up and working, but there are a few things i want to start with.

  1. What are some easy things i should look into to start off, i still need to make sure my server runes on my no-ip and need help setting up that. But after that where should i start? What are basic things i should know/learn and go over first?
  2. I am aiming/wanting to add Dclaws with a fully functional 4x spec attack with animations. Is this hard or easy, and how would i go about doing that.
  3. I edited my character file to be 99 in every skill. When i talk to the wise old man (skillcape store) i can see all of them and value and attempt to buy them. as long as i have no cash in my inventory. now when i talk to him with cash in my inventory. My client freezes. How do I fix this?

if anyone can tell me how, or point me to tutorials on how that would be great thanks :D[/quote]
317 are way to easy to code. i could help u and be by your side if u need me pm me with Title Need Help Coding 317

Read full topic
item.source: New RSPS coder. Many questions. Probably obvious answers

item.title: New RSPS coder. Many questions. Probably obvious answers
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“grayzai11, post:4, topic:450203”]@hur i searched for dclaws in the item list and it isn’t there… :S

@Rocket 1. What would you go with then?
2. ok, ill do that.
3. ill check that out too, is it very hard? Or is there a good one to start with that it is pre-done
4. Know how to fix it?[/quote]

I believe the problem is with one of the capes, I’m not sure which one. I don’t and will never use Project Insanity.

What base should you use? If you want to learn Java use one of these:

Shard Revolution Hyperion RuneSource

If you want to get an easy idea of how simple Java works, use something like DeltaScape. Something that isn’t packaged is probably ideal for your first base.

Read full topic

item.source: New RSPS coder. Many questions. Probably obvious answers

item.title: New RSPS coder. Many questions. Probably obvious answers
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

  1. I wouldn’t go with P.I. as a first base choice.
  2. Go to the Server Help section and follow the tutorial named “How to Setup a Server”.
  3. There are multiple tutorials on how to add Dragon Claws, use the Search feature and Google.
  4. That sounds like the Skillcape shop glitch a few people were having trouble with a while back in P.I.

Read full topic

@grayzai11 wrote:

Hello!

I’m just starting to do coding for java and RSPSs, i know next to nil. But am expiramenting. I’m using Project Insanity to base my server off, and i forget the client name, but it went with it. I got my game up and working, but there are a few things i want to start with.

  1. What are some easy things i should look into to start off, i still need to make sure my server runes on my no-ip and need help setting up that. But after that where should i start? What are basic things i should know/learn and go over first?
